name: Neon Invasion
description:
NEON INVASION IN STILL IN DEVELOPMENT

Neon Invasion is an alien-killing, Earth-saving VR shooting action game

Developed for the Oculus Rift on PC and made in Unity.

Story

Earth is under great threat from a new planet that has entered the Solar System.  The new planet, Astatine, has become overpopulated with glowing creatures that are willing to share intelligence and advanced technology with the whole universe.  You are Earth's representative sent by humanity's leaders into space.  Your mission is to prevent the Astatineans from helping people grow smarter.  The oppressive elite of Earth strive to control large masses of individuals by keeping humanity ignorant.  Help Earth stay dumb!

Features
  • Shoot or slice aliens
  • Destroy alien probes
  • Dodge alien objects
  • Save the Earth
Controls

Oculus Rift & Oculus Touch controls.

Specifications

The game was developed  on a PC with the following specifications:

OS: Windows 10

Processor: AMD FX8350

Memory: 16GB RAM 

Graphics: Radeon R9 390X 

DirectX: Version 11
